00056                 public function referrers_list()
00057                 {
00058                         $db = new DBConn();
00059                         
00060                         if (isset($_REQUEST['g']) && !empty($_REQUEST['g']))
00061                         {
00062                                 $db->prepare("SELECT `referrer`, COUNT(`referrer`) AS `count` " .
00063                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00064                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` NOT LIKE 'http://{1}%' " .
00065                                                         "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{2}%' " .
00066                                                         "AND `referrer` != '') " .
00067                                                 "GROUP BY `referrer` " .
00068                                                 "ORDER BY `count` DESC " .
00069                                                 "LIMIT {3}",
00070                                                 $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00071                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00072                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00073                         }
00074                         else
00075                         {
00076                                 $db->prepare("SELECT DISTINCT `id`, `date`, `referrer` " .
00077                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00078                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` NOT LIKE 'http://{1}%' " .
00079                                                         "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{2}%' " .
00080                                                         "AND `referrer` != '') " .
00081                                                 "ORDER BY `date` DESC " .
00082                                                 "LIMIT {3}",
00083                                                 $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'],
00084                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00085                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00086                         }
00087                         $result = $db->exec();
00088                         
00089                         $this->referrers = array();
00090                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00091                         {
00092                                 while ($referrer = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00093                                 {
00094                                         $this->referrers[] = $referrer;
00095                                 }
00096                         }
00097                         $db->free_result($result);
00098                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00099                 }

00117                 public function queries_list()
00118                 {
00119                         $db = new DBConn();
00120                         
00121                         if (isset($_REQUEST['g']) && $_REQUEST['g'] == 'true')
00122                         {
00123                                 $db->prepare("SELECT `referrer`, COUNT(`referrer`) AS `count` " .
00124                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00125                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` LIKE 'http://www.google%q=%' " .
00126                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://%yahoo.com%p=%' " .
00127                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://search.live.com/results.aspx?q=%') " .
00128                                                 "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00129                                                 "GROUP BY `referrer` " .
00130                                                 "ORDER BY `count` DESC " .
00131                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00132                                                 isset($_REQUEST['q']) ? $_REQUEST['q'] : '',
00133                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00134                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00135                         }
00136                         else
00137                         {
00138                                 $db->prepare("SELECT `id`, `date`, `referrer` " .
00139                                                 "FROM `visits` " .
00140                                                 "WHERE (`referrer` LIKE 'http://www.google%q=%' " .
00141                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://%yahoo.com%p=%' " .
00142                                                         "OR `referrer` LIKE 'http://search.live.com/results.aspx?q=%') " .
00143                                                 "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00144                                                 "ORDER BY `date` DESC " .
00145                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00146                                                 isset($_REQUEST['q']) ? $_REQUEST['q'] : '',
00147                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00148                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00149                         }
00150                         $result = $db->exec();
00151                         
00152                         $this->queries = array();
00153                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00154                         {
00155                                 while ($search = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00156                                 {
00157                                         preg_match("/(\&|\?)(p|q)=([^\&]+)/", $search['referrer'], $matches);
00158                                         $term = utf8_decode(urldecode($matches[3]));
00159                                         if (!empty($_REQUEST["q"]) && stristr($term, $_REQUEST["q"]) === FALSE)
00160                                         {
00161                                                 continue;
00162                                         }
00163                                         $this->queries[] = new Query(array_merge(array('term' => $term), $search));
00164                                 }
00165                         }
00166                         $db->free_result($result);
00167                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00168                 }

00184                 public function outbounds_list()
00185                 {
00186                         $dbconn = new DBConn();
00187                         
00188                         if (isset($_REQUEST['g']))
00189                         {
00190                                 $dbconn->prepare("SELECT `url`, COUNT(`url`) AS `count` " .
00191                                                 "FROM `outbounds` " .
00192                                                 "WHERE `url` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00193                                                 "GROUP BY `url` " .
00194                                                 "ORDER BY `count` DESC " .
00195                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00196                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00197                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00198                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00199                         }
00200                         else
00201                         {
00202                                 $dbconn->prepare("SELECT `id`, `occurred_at`, `url` " .
00203                                                 "FROM `outbounds` " .
00204                                                 "WHERE `url` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00205                                                 "ORDER BY `occurred_at` DESC " .
00206                                                 "LIMIT {2}, {3}",
00207                                                 isset($_REQUEST['f']) ? $_REQUEST['f'] : '',
00208                                                 isset($_REQUEST['s']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['s']) ? $_REQUEST['s'] : 0,
00209                                                 isset($_REQUEST['l']) && is_numeric($_REQUEST['l']) ? $_REQUEST['l'] : 50);
00210                         }
00211                         $dbconn->exec();
00212                         
00213                         $this->outbounds = array();
00214                         if ($dbconn->num_rows() > 0)
00215                         {
00216                                 while ($item = $dbconn->fetch_assoc())
00217                                 {
00218                                         $out = new Outbound($item);
00219                                         if (isset($item['count']))
00220                                         {
00221                                                 $out->count = $item['count'];
00222                                         }
00223                                         $this->outbounds[] = $out;
00224                                 }
00225                         }
00226                         $dbconn->free_result();
00227                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00228                 }

00245                 public function hits_by_host_list()
00246                 {
00247                         global $db;
00248 
00249                         $db->prepare("SELECT `ip_addr`, `params`, COUNT(*) AS `weight` " .
00250                                         "FROM `visits` " .
00251                                         "WHERE `gate` LIKE '%{1}%' " .
00252                                         "AND `date` >= '{2}' " .
00253                                         "AND (`ip_addr` LIKE '%{3}%' " .
00254                                         "OR `params` LIKE '%Apache'' => ''%{3}%') " .
00255                                         "AND `referrer` LIKE '%{4}%' " .
00256                                         "GROUP BY CONCAT(`ip_addr`, `user_agent`) " .
00257                                         "HAVING `weight` >= '{5}' AND `weight` <= '{6}' " .
00258                                         "ORDER BY `weight` DESC " .
00259                                         "LIMIT {7}",
00260                                         @$_REQUEST['p'],
00261                                         date("Y-m-d H:i:s", Time::ago(@$_REQUEST['t'])),
00262                                         @$_REQUEST['f'],
00263                                         @$_REQUEST['r'],
00264                                         @$_REQUEST['l'],
00265                                         @$_REQUEST['h'],
00266                                         9999);
00267                         $result = $db->exec();
00268                         
00269                         $this->hosts = array();
00270                         if ($db->num_rows() > 0)
00271                         {
00272                                 while ($line = mysql_fetch_assoc($result))
00273                                 {
00274                                         $host = Host::by_ip_addr($line['ip_addr'], $line['params']);
00275                                         $host->weight = $line['weight'];
00276                                         $this->hosts[] = $host;
00277                                 }
00278                         }
00279                         //$db->free_result();
00280                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00281                 }

00287                 public function ip()
00288                 {
00289                         $visit_factory = new Visit();
00290                         $this->visits = $visit_factory->find_by_query('SELECT * ' .
00291                                 'FROM `visits` ' .
00292                                 "WHERE `ip_addr` = '{$_REQUEST['ip']}' " .
00293                                 'ORDER BY `date` DESC');
00294                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00295                 }

00301                 public function unblock_ip()
00302                 {
00303                         if (isset($_GET['id']))
00304                         {
00305                                 $blocked_ip = new BlockedIp();
00306                                 $blocked_ip->find_by_id($_GET['id']);
00307                                 $blocked_ip->delete();
00308                                 die(l('IP address unblocked.'));
00309                         }
00310                         die(l('You must provide an id in order to unblock an IP address.'));
00311                 }
00312                 
00317                 public function block_ip()
00318                 {
00319                         $blocked_ip = new BlockedIp();
00320                         $blocked_ip->ip_addr = $_REQUEST['ip'];
00321                         $blocked_ip->save();
00322                         die(sprintf(l('IP address %s correctly blocked.'), $_REQUEST['ip']));
00323                 }

00339                 public function blocked_ips_list()
00340                 {
00341                         global $db;
00342                         
00343                         $bip_factory = new BlockedIp();
00344                         $this->blocked_ips = $bip_factory->find_all(array(
00345                                 'where_clause' => "`ip_addr` LIKE '%{$db->escape(@$_REQUEST['q'])}%'",
00346                                 'order_by' => '`blocked_at` DESC'));
00347                         $this->render(array('layout' => FALSE));
00348                 }

00380                 public function attribute_visits()
00381                 {
00382                         global $db;
00383 
00384                         $visit_factory = new Visit();
00385                         $visits = $visit_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`date` >= '{$db->escape(date("Y-m-d H:i:s", Time::ago(@$_REQUEST['t'])))}' " .
00386                                         "AND (`ip_addr` = '{$db->escape(@$_REQUEST['ip'])}' " .
00387                                         "OR `params` LIKE '%Apache'' => ''{$db->escape(@$_REQUEST['ip'])}%')"));
00388                         if (count($visits) > 0)
00389                         {
00390                                 foreach ($visits as $visit)
00391                                 {
00392                                         $visit->person_id = @$_REQUEST['person_id'];
00393                                         $visit->save();
00394                                 }
00395                         }
00396                         $this->render(NULL);
00397                 }
